ldcconfig.attribute: Control hierarchy flattening
Preserve net from being optmized away
Set fanout limit for an individual input port, net, or register output
Do not remove instance with undriven outputs
Preserve register logic or optimize as needed
Implementation for inferred RAM
Implementation for inferred ROM
Enable packing of register into I/O pad cell
Specify use of global/set reset routing resources
Enable/disable carry chain implementation for counters, adders
Pin location
Encoding style for state machine (sequential, onehot)
Allow register to be moved if it improves performance
Allow duplication of register to improve timing
Enable/disable I/O insertion on an unused port
Insert/remove I/O buffer on/from port or net, when auto I/O buffer insertion is disabled/enabled
Implementation of sequential shift components
Control inferencing of state machines
Infer register with clock-enable pin
Implementation of multiplier
Enables or disables the sharing of operator resources during the compilation stage of synthesis.
